points.title: First-party cookies are used

case.title: First-party cookies are used
case.localized_title: Utilisation de cookies de première partie
case.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.

points.title: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account

case.title: Users who have been permanently banned from this service are not allowed to re-register under a new account
case.localized_title: Les utilisateurs qui ont été bannis de façon permanente de ce service ne sont pas autorisés à se réinscrire sous un nouveau compte.
case.description: Once users have been permanently banned from this service, they are not allowed to create a new account to keep using the service.

points.title: Per the service's terms, you may not express negative opinions about them

case.title: Per the service's terms, you may not express negative opinions about them
case.localized_title: Selon les conditions d'utilisation du service, vous ne pouvez pas exprimer d'opinions négatives à leur sujet.
case.description: Criticising, questioning, making objections or complaints about the Service, its staff or anything related to it is prohibited and constitutes a breach of the Terms.

points.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.

case.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.
case.localized_title: Ce service est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation individuelle et non commerciale.
case.description: Users can't use the Service for commercial purposes (unless the Service consents): it is only for personal, individual purposes.

points.title: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security

case.title: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security
case.localized_title: Vous devez signaler au service toute utilisation non autorisée de votre compte ou toute violation de la sécurité
case.description: The service asks the user to notify them immediately of any unauthorized use or security breaches.

points.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

case.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
case.localized_title: Vous êtes responsable du maintien de la sécurité de votre compte et des activités qui s'y déroulent
case.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.

points.title: This service is only available to users over 18 years old

case.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
case.localized_title: Ce service est réservé aux utilisateurs âgés de plus de 18 ans.
case.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.

points.title: Your account can be suspended for several reasons

case.title: Your account can be suspended for several reasons
case.localized_title: Votre compte peut être suspendu pour plusieurs raisons

points.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

case.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles sont regroupées dans des statistiques
case.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.

points.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties

case.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties
case.localized_title: Les informations vous concernant sont recueillies par des tiers
case.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.

points.title: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates

case.title: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates
case.localized_title: Ce service reçoit votre position précise grâce aux coordonnées GPS
case.description: Unless the service relies on Geo Location, this case is to be assigned to points that don't need your GPS coordinates to function properly.

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
case.localized_title: Les cookies de tiers sont utilisés pour la publicité
case.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.

points.title: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels

case.title: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels
case.localized_title: Vous êtes suivi par les cookies/pixels des médias sociaux.
case.description: These types of cookies/pixels send information to social media sites when you interact with the service.

points.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

case.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
case.localized_title: Des informations sont fournies sur la manière dont vos données personnelles sont utilisées
case.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.

points.title: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect

case.title: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect
case.localized_title: Des détails sont fournis sur le type d'informations collectées.
case.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.

points.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.

case.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.
case.localized_title: Au lieu de vous le demander directement, ce service présumera que vous avez donné votre consentement en fonction de l'usage que vous en faites.
case.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.

points.title: You waive your right to a class action.

case.title: You waive your right to a class action.
case.localized_title: Vous renoncez à votre droit à une action collective.
case.description: The right to be represented in a class action (or representative action) exists in the US and some European countries. It allows people who have been similarly injured by the same accused to take legal action by a single lawsuit instead of individually. Some Terms of Service try to limit that right. By agreeing to them, you could waive (= renounce to) your right to a class action, which might reduce your chances to be successful in a case.

points.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user or $100

case.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user
case.localized_title: Toute responsabilité au nom du service est limitée aux frais que vous avez payés en tant qu'utilisateur ou à 100 $.

points.title: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes

case.title: You are forced into binding arbitration in case of disputes
case.localized_title: Vous êtes contraint de recourir à l'arbitrage obligatoire en cas de litige
case.description: This service forces users to use their own contracted arbitrator and forces users to waive their rights to jury trial.

points.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection (Texas, USA)

case.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is less friendly to user privacy protection.
case.localized_title: Le tribunal qui régit les conditions est situé dans une juridiction moins favorable à la protection de la vie privée des utilisateurs (Texas, États-Unis).
case.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for weak data regulations and poor user privacy protection. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case the reason why it shall be applied.

points.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

case.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
case.localized_title: Ce service transmet vos données personnelles à des tiers impliqués dans son fonctionnement
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.

points.title: You are informed about the risk of publishing personal info online

case.title: You are informed about the risk of publishing personal info online
case.localized_title: Vous êtes informé des risques liés à la publication d'informations personnelles en ligne

points.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data

case.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez récupérer une archive de vos données
case.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.

points.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

case.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles peuvent être vendues ou transférées dans le cadre d'une procédure de faillite ou d'un autre type de transaction financière.
case.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.

points.title: You can choose with whom you share content

case.title: You can choose with whom you share content
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez choisir avec qui vous partagez votre contenu
case.description: Users can decide whether or not they want their content to be shared and they can control how and with whom it is shared.

points.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

case.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
case.localized_title: Vous êtes suivi par des balises web, des pixels de suivi, des empreintes de navigateur et/ou des empreintes d'appareil.
case.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.

points.title: Third parties are involved in operating the service

case.title: Third parties are involved in operating the service
case.localized_title: Des tiers sont impliqués dans l'exploitation du service

points.title: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security

case.title: You must report to the service any unauthorized use of your account or any breach of security
case.localized_title: Vous devez signaler au service toute utilisation non autorisée de votre compte ou toute violation de la sécurité
case.description: The service asks the user to notify them immediately of any unauthorized use or security breaches.

points.title: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising

case.title: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles sont utilisées pour faire de la publicité ciblée par des tiers.
case.description: Your Personal Information is traded and shared with advertising companies to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites. Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile.

points.title: Google Analytics is used for statistics

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
case.localized_title: Google Analytics est utilisé pour les statistiques
case.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.

points.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age

case.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
case.localized_title: Ce service n'est accessible qu'aux utilisateurs ayant dépassé un certain âge.
case.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.

points.title: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed

case.title: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed
case.localized_title: Il n'est pas permis d'explorer le site, de le parcourir ou d'y accéder par des moyens automatisés.

points.title: Sensitive data is collected and shared to target advertising
points.analysis: "Some of the information you choose to provide us may be considered “special” or “sensitive” in certain jurisdictions, for example your racial or ethnic origins, sexual orientation and religious beliefs. By choosing to provide this information, you consent to our processing of that information."

case.title: Sensitive data is collected and shared to target advertising
case.localized_title: Des données sensibles sont collectées et partagées pour cibler la publicité.
case.description: Sensitive data refers to information requiring special protection, such as health data, political and religious beliefs, ethnic origins, sexual life and financial information. The service collects and shares this data with third parties for advertising or marketing.

points.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you

case.title: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you
case.localized_title: Ce service se réserve le droit de divulguer vos informations personnelles sans vous en informer
case.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.

points.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not involved in its operation

case.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation
case.localized_title: Ce service partage vos données personnelles avec des tiers qui ne sont pas impliqués dans son fonctionnement
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties nonessential to the service’s operation. This could be a business partner that receives your data to provide targeted advertisements.

points.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

case.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez demander l'accès, la correction et/ou la suppression de vos données
case.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.

points.title: This services gives no guarantee regarding quality
points.analysis: TINDER DOES NOT REPRESENT OR WARRANT THAT (A) THE SERVICE WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED, SECURE OR ERROR FREE, (B) ANY DEFECTS OR ERRORS IN THE SERVICE WILL BE CORRECTED, OR (C) THAT ANY CONTENT OR INFORMATION YOU OBTAIN ON OR THROUGH THE SERVICE WILL BE ACCURATE.

case.title: No guarantee is given regarding quality
case.localized_title: Ce service ne donne aucune garantie de qualité
case.description: The Service doesn't warrant or guarantee the quality of the products or services provided.

points.title: This service ignores the Do Not Track (DNT) header and tracks users anyway even if they set this header.
points.analysis:
Do Not Track (“DNT”) is a privacy preference that users can set in their web browsers. DNT is a way for users to inform websites and services that they do not want certain information about their webpage visits collected over time and across websites or online services. 

Tinder provides opt-out links instead, because they do not recognize or respond to any DNT signals, saying that the Internet industry needs to work towards defining exactly what DNT means, and what it means to comply with DNT, and finding a common approach to responding to DNT.

case.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
case.localized_title: Ce service ignore l'en-tête Do Not Track (DNT) et suit les utilisateurs même s'ils ont activé cet en-tête.
case.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.
